ValidationRule.description: Validation rule on Interest field that only allows that permission to edit the interest fields
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( ISCHANGED ( Total_Interest_Amount__c ) ) && !$Permission.DLSE_JEU && NOT( CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator') ) && $Profile.Name <> 'WCA User' && $Profile.Name <> 'JEU User'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Must have JEU Permission to edit this field
